#!/bin/ash
# Vanilla Xonotic Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk add rsync --no-cache

cd /mnt/server

wget http://dl.xonotic.org/xonotic-0.8.2.zip

unzip xonotic-0.8.2.zip
